dao

Class CustomerDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.CustomerDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO

    public class CustomerDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO
    The class CustomerDBDAO is the class that do all the required access work with DB using the methods below. implements CustomerDAO and apply the following methods. this class using the SqlQueries class for all the SQL queries in all methods.
    Author:
    chaim_chagbi
